settings.title: Settings
settings.aiLanguage.label: AI Language
settings.aiLanguage.description: Choose the language for AI-generated content like summaries, topics, and chat responses.
settings.uiLanguage.label: Interface Language
settings.uiLanguage.description: Choose the display language for the app interface (buttons, labels, etc.).
settings.apiKey.label: Gemini API Key Configuration
settings.apiKey.status.userConnected_des: The app is using the API key you provided below.
settings.apiKey.status.notConnected_desc: AI features are disabled. Provide your key below to enable them.
settings.apiKey.user.label: Your Personal Gemini API Key
settings.apiKey.user.description: Enter your Gemini API key to enable all AI features.
settings.apiKey.user.link: Get your API key from Google AI Studio
settings.theme.label: Theme
settings.aiProfile.label: AI Performance Profile
settings.aiProfile.quality.label: Max Quality
settings.aiProfile.quality.description: Uses the most powerful models for the best results. (Default)
settings.aiProfile.balanced.label: Balanced
settings.aiProfile.balanced.description: A mix of performance and cost-effectiveness for everyday use.
settings.aiProfile.savings.label: Max Savings
settings.aiProfile.savings.description: Uses faster, cheaper models. Good for simple tasks.
noteList.sort.title: Title
chatbot.title: Cognito AI Assistant
chatbot.welcome.title: Ask Me Anything!
chatbot.welcome.description: I can search your notes to answer questions, find information, and more. Try asking a question!
chatbot.suggestedPrompt1: Summarize my note titled 'Welcome to NoteTaker AI!'
chatbot.suggestedPrompt2: What are my to-do items from the 'Getting Started' project?
chatbot.suggestedPrompt3: Find all notes with the 'tutorial' tag
dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.actions.title: Quick Actions
dashboard.actions.newNoteDesc: Create a new note, with an option to use a template.
dashboard.glance.title: At a Glance
dashboard.recent.title: Recent Notes
dashboard.projects.title: Projects
dashboard.projects.empty: No projects yet. Create a note to start one.
dashboard.features.title: All Features
dashboard.features.ai.title: AI-Powered Organization
dashboard.features.ai.cat.title: Automatic Categorization
dashboard.features.ai.cat.desc: The AI automatically assigns a project and subject to each note.
dashboard.features.ai.summaries.title: Automatic Summaries
dashboard.features.ai.summaries.desc: Generates both a concise and a detailed summary for long notes and meetings.
dashboard.features.ai.todos.title: To-Do Extraction
dashboard.features.ai.todos.desc: Pulls actionable to-do items from your text so you don't miss anything.
dashboard.features.ai.people.title: Key People Detection
dashboard.features.ai.people.desc: Identifies and lists any people mentioned in your note.
dashboard.features.ai.decisions.title: Key Decision Tracking
dashboard.features.ai.decisions.desc: Extracts and highlights key decisions made during meetings.
dashboard.features.ai.tags.title: Intelligent Tagging
dashboard.features.ai.tags.desc: Suggests relevant tags for easy filtering and finding related content.
dashboard.features.meeting.title: Meeting Assistant
dashboard.features.meeting.transcript.de: Capture conversations in real-time with the 'Start a Meeting' feature.
dashboard.features.meeting.screen.title: Screenshot Context
dashboard.features.meeting.screen.desc: Optionally share your screen during meetings; the AI uses screenshots for richer summaries.
dashboard.features.productivity.title: Content & Productivity
dashboard.features.productivity.upload.d: Upload images, PDFs, or DOCX files. The AI performs OCR and organizes them into notes.
dashboard.features.productivity.search.d: Search across titles, content, detailed summaries, and tags to find anything instantly.
dashboard.features.productivity.chat.des: Chat with your notes. Ask questions and get synthesized answers from your knowledge base.
dashboard.features.productivity.template: Save any note as a template to speed up creation of recurring documents.
dashboard.features.productivity.translat: Translate your notes into multiple languages with a single click.
dashboard.features.productivity.tone.des: Rewrite your text in different tones like professional, casual, or friendly.
tutorial.step1.title: Welcome to NoteTaker AI!
tutorial.step1.content:
Welcome! This quick tour will show you how to use your new smart notepad to build a second brain.

**Privacy Note:** Your data is processed by Google's Gemini API but is never stored or used to train their models. Your notes remain yours, always.
tutorial.step2.title: The Main Menu
tutorial.step2.content: Start here. Use this menu to create new notes, start meetings, upload files, and manage settings.
tutorial.step3.title: Your Note List
tutorial.step3.content: All of your notes live here, organized by project and topic. You can search, sort, and filter to find anything in seconds.
tutorial.step4.title: The Editor
tutorial.step4.content: This is your workspace. The left side is for writing, while the right side shows AI-powered insights.
tutorial.step5.title: Seamless AI Sync
tutorial.step5.content: There is no 'Sync' button! The AI processes your notes automatically in the background. When this logo pulses, the AI is working.
tutorial.step6.title: Instant Insights
tutorial.step6.content: After a sync, this panel populates with a summary, to-dos, key people, and tags. It's your note, but smarter.
tutorial.step7.title: AI Quick Actions
tutorial.step7.content: Unlock more AI power here! Translate, change tone, summarize selections, and more.
tutorial.step8.title: Your AI Assistant, Cognito
tutorial.step8.content: Click here to chat with your notes. Ask questions, find tasks, and get information instantly.
tutorial.step9.title: You're All Set!
tutorial.step9.content: You're ready to create, organize, and supercharge your productivity. Enjoy building your second brain!
meeting.title: Meeting Assistant
meeting.info: Choose your audio source. Use 'Mic' for live dictation or 'System' to record audio from a shared tab or window (requires screen sharing with audio).
meeting.transcript.title: Transcript
meeting.transcript.systemRecording: Recording system audio... a full transcript will be generated after you save.
meeting.screenshare.title: Screen Share
meeting.screenshare.info: Share your screen to enable system audio capture and provide visual context for the AI.
upload.title: Upload Content
upload.info: The AI will automatically analyze your files, perform OCR on images/PDFs, and organize them into new notes.
upload.dropzone.browse: Click to browse or drag & drop files here
upload.dropzone.supported: Supported: txt, md, docx, xlsx, pdf, png, jpg
upload.assignProject.label: Assign to project
template.title: New from Template
template.empty.title: No templates found.
template.empty.description: You can save any note as a template using the bookmark icon in the editor.
template.blankNote.title: Blank Note
template.blankNote.description: Start fresh with an empty page.
onboarding.title: Welcome to NoteTaker AI
onboarding.subtitle: A few quick settings to get you started.
onboarding.language.label: Choose your language
onboarding.language.description: This will set the language for the entire app interface.
onboarding.apiKey.label: Connect to Gemini API
onboarding.apiKey.description: Paste your Gemini API key here to unlock all AI features.
onboarding.apiKey.link: Get your API key from Google AI Studio
prompts.unsavedWarning: You have notes stored in this browser's cache. Before you leave, consider exporting your notes from the main menu to create a backup. Are you sure you want to exit?
prompts.import.confirm.message: This will merge {noteCount} notes and {projectCount} projects into your current library. Existing projects with the same name will be merged. Are you sure you want to continue?
prompts.import.error: Import failed. The file may be invalid or corrupted.
prompts.error.title: An error occurred
history.title: Note Version History
history.empty: No previous versions found for this note.
history.selectVersion: Select a version to view its content.
